testSteps.description: Then [badak-app] the schema should be same
And [badak-app] response time must be less than '2000' 'MILLISECONDS'

exception.message:
Response Time is More than 2000 seconds
Expected: a value less than or equal to <2000L>
     but: <2544L> was greater than <2000L>

stackTrace.methodName: [badak-app] response time must be less than '2000' 'MILLISECONDS'
